author: crossley
msg: Cocoon's use of xml-fop seems to have some troubles. Going back to Forrest packaged stuff while investigating.

author: markrmiller
msg: SOLR-5216: Document updates to SolrCloud can cause a distributed deadlock.
SOLR-5232: SolrCloud should distribute updates via streaming rather than buffering.

author: cmccabe
msg: HDFS-5203. Concurrent clients that add a cache directive on the same path may prematurely uncache each other.  (Chris Nauroth via Colin Patrick McCabe)

author: markrmiller
